job.title: Sr. Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtparker lynch is assisting our client to hire a new sr software engineer to their permanent growing team the ideal candidate is a selfmotivated multitasker and demonstrated teamplayer you will be a senior developer responsible for the development of new software products and enhancements to existing products as well as mentorship of more junior developers on the team you should excel in working with largescale applications and frameworks and have outstanding communication and leadership skillsampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggt responsibilitiesltstronggtampnbspampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtdevelopment of applications in a web services environmentampnbspltligtltligtwriting clean highquality highperformance maintainable codeltligtltligtintegrationampnbspwith rdampnbspparty apisampnbspltligtltligtsystem architecture and designltligtltligtuser interface designampnbspampnbspltligtltligtweb service design and modelingampnbspampnbspltligtltligtgolive planning and implementationampnbspltligtltligtsoftware maintenanceampnbspltligtltligttrouble shooting and resolving problemsampnbspltligtltligtenhancing application and system securityampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggt ltstronggtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtampnbspampnbspltpgtltulgtltligt years of software development experienceampnbspltligtltligtc net core or perlampnbspampnbspltligtltligtstrong software development skillsampnbspltligtltligtstrong oop skills ampampampnbspfluency in an oop languageampnbspltligtltligtunixlinux command line environment skillsampnbspltligtltligtexperience with version controlampnbspampnbspltligtltligtagile methodologies preferredampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthis is an immediate opportunity and will move fast please apply to this posting or contact julie fanshier at for additional information this is a direct hire position will be based in kansas city and is not offering sponsorshipltpgt
